sourcesContent:
<template>

    <v-menu
        class="ma-0 pa-0"
        left
        offset-y>
        <template v-slot:activator="{ on, attrs }">
            <v-btn
                class="ml-5 grey--text text-capitalize"
                icon
                v-bind="attrs"
                v-on="on">
                Phases
            </v-btn>
        </template>
        <v-list>
            <v-list-item
                v-for="(phase, index) in selectedPlan.phases"
                :key="index"
                @click="menuActionClick(phase)">
                <v-btn text class="grey--text text-capitalize">{{ phase.name }}</v-btn>
            </v-list-item>
        </v-list>
    </v-menu>
    <!-- <PhaseMenu
        :phases=selectedPlan.phases
        @open-phase-card='openPhaseCard' /> -->

</template>

<script>
import PhaseMenu from '@/components/phase/PhaseMenu'

export default {
    name: 'PlanDetailView',
    components: {
        PhaseMenu,
    },
    data() {
        return {
        }
    },
    computed: {
        selectedPlan: {
            get() {
                return this.$store.state.selectedPlan
            }
        },
        selectedPhase: {
            get() {
                return this.$store.state.selectedPhaseData.phase
            }
        },
        selectedPhaseIndex: {
            get() {
                return this.$store.state.selectedPhaseData.index
            }
        },
        selectedStrategy: {
            get() {
                return this.$store.state.selectedStrategyData.strategy
            }
        },
    },
    methods: {
        menuActionClick(phase) {
            // this.$emit('open-phase-card', phase)
        },
        openPhaseCard(phase) {
            console.log(phase)
        }
    }
}
</script>
